plot outline: A young boy accidentally boards a train from Hubli to Bengaluru, getting separated from his family and ending up in an orpahange. He is subsequently adopted by a couple who take him to Europe. Two decades later, he returns to his homeland in search of his biological parents.
title: Missing Boy
plot: story of a boy coming from Europe in search of his parents, has the right premise for that. Does it work? Yes, to a great extent.
